mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.we_code AS "weCode", a.we_name AS "weName", a.we_desc AS "weDesc", a.we_parent AS "weParent", a.we_type AS "weType", a.we_appid AS "weAppid", a.we_secrect AS "weSecrect", a.we_macid AS "weMacid", a.we_key AS "weKey", a.we_notifyurl AS "weNotifyurl", a.we_web_notifyurl AS "weWebNotifyurl", a.we_redirecturl AS "weRedirecturl", a.we_cert_path AS "weCertPath", a.we_develop AS "weDevelop", a.we_develop_addr AS "weDevelopAddr", a.we_service_name AS "weServiceName", a.language AS "language", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.we_gh AS "weGh"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ourway_sys_wxconfig( owid, we_code, we_name, we_desc, we_parent, we_type, we_appid, we_secrect, we_macid, we_key, we_notifyurl, we_web_notifyurl, we_redirecturl, we_cert_path, we_develop, we_develop_addr, we_service_name, language, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, delflg, state, dept_id, dept_path, we_gh ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{weCode}, #{weName}, #{weDesc}, #{weParent}, #{weType}, #{weAppid}, #{weSecrect}, #{weMacid}, #{weKey}, #{weNotifyurl}, #{weWebNotifyurl}, #{weRedirecturl}, #{weCertPath}, #{weDevelop}, #{weDevelopAddr}, #{weServiceName}, #{language}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{weGh} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ourway_sys_wxconfig SET we_code = #{weCode}, we_name = #{weName}, we_desc = #{weDesc}, we_parent = #{weParent}, we_type = #{weType}, we_appid = #{weAppid}, we_secrect = #{weSecrect}, we_macid = #{weMacid}, we_key = #{weKey}, we_notifyurl = #{weNotifyurl}, we_web_notifyurl = #{weWebNotifyurl}, we_redirecturl = #{weRedirecturl}, we_cert_path = #{weCertPath}, we_develop = #{weDevelop}, we_develop_addr = #{weDevelopAddr}, we_service_name = #{weServiceName}, language = #{language}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, we_gh = #{weGh} WHERE owid = #{owid}
